protected static java.lang.String OID
          The ID unique for each new object, regardless if it is really new or a new copy of an already existing object

Description copied from interface: VCollection
Inserts a new object to the collection. If the object does not have a UID yet, a new one will be generated and saved in the object's uid attribute.

find

                    java.lang.String... fields)
Description copied from interface: VCollection
Find by example. Returns all objects that match the given example, but only return the requested fields. Omit all other fields, thus return partial objects only.

Specified by:
find in interface VCollection
Parameters:
example - the example object
